text: You see the DJ jamming to the beat, that's so neat!
Hi! What's up? Do you like the music?
That's good! Because we got some more!

DJ puts some deep beats down.
Everybody gets on the ground.
It's [color=#d77bba]the boogie of the century![/color]

Suddenly you feel [color=#99e550][i]not so well.[/i][/color]
You run to the toilet room...
